title: BRIEF-National Western Life Group Q4 Oper SHR $10.48

organizations.name: reuters) - national western life group inc

text: February 28, 2018 / 7:07 PM / Updated 23 minutes ago BRIEF-National Western Life Group Q4 Oper SHR $10.48 Reuters Staff Feb 28 (Reuters) - National Western Life Group Inc: * NATIONAL WESTERN LIFE GROUP, INC. ANNOUNCES 2017 FULL YEAR AND FOURTH QUARTER EARNINGS * Q4 OPERATING EARNINGS PER SHARE $10.48 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $11.19 * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $247.8 MILLION VERSUS $184.5 MILLION * COâ€˜S BOOK VALUE PER SHARE INCREASED TO $503.88 AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 FROM $473.53 AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2016 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
